item.title: About
item.description:
I am a JSPS Research Fellow in the Graduate School of Advanced Mathematical Sciences at Meiji University, where I am pursuing a Ph.D. in Mathematical Sciences.

My research revolves around complex systems, exploring topics ranging from social dynamics to mathematical biology. I use tools from statistical physics, mathematics, and computation to uncover the fundamental principles underlying a diverse array of phenomena.
